Student_Hold_Type_and_Context_Data.description: Academic Unit Hold Context for Registration, Diploma, Refund, Charge Assessment, and Financial Aid Holds.

validation.validation: The Hold Type is not a valid Hold Type for this Hold Reason.
You can only use an academic period that is on the academic calendar for the primary program of study on the academic record.
Academic Period must be on the Academic Calendar for the Student's Primary Program of Study.
The Award Year needs to be current, in the future, or 1 year prior.
The Academic Record must be valid for the Student.
Academic Period must be current or in the future.
The Federal School Code Rule Set needs to be associated with the Academic Unit and Level for the Student.
Enter either an Academic Record or an Institution for Registration & Diploma Holds, or leave both blank.
Enter either a Federal School Code or an Institution for Packaging & Disbursement Holds, or leave both blank.
Institution is not a valid context for a Hold Type of Transcript.
You can only use an academic period that is on the academic calendar for the primary program of study on an academic record for the institution.
The Context Academic Unit must be Institutional.
Specify a Student Hold Type for Valid for Academic Period Context.
Specify a Student Hold Type for Valid for Financial Aid Award Year Context.
Specify a Student Hold Type for Valid for Federal School Code Rule Set Context.
Specify a Student Hold Type for Valid for Academic Record Context.

Student_Hold_Assignment_with_Multiple_Ho.description: Set this to True if in order to remove this hold assignment.  This is for existing hold assignments only.

validation.validation: You may not apply a duplicate hold.
Only existing hold assignments can be removed.
Hold assignments that have been removed cannot be updated or removed.
Enter the same Academic Period for each Hold Type.
Enter the same Academic Record for each Hold Type.
You cannot update the hold reason for an existing hold assignment.
Enter the same Financial Aid Award Year for each Hold Type.
Student Hold Assignments cannot have Student Hold Reason of Outstanding Action Item.
Enter the same Federal School Code Rule Set for each Hold Type.
You can't select the same Hold Type more than once.
You can't update the hold types for an existing hold assignment.
Enter the same Institutional Academic Unit for each Hold Type.
You can't create a new student hold assignment with the delivered hold reason Past Due Balance.
You can't change the student the hold is applied to.
